tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_contacts(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_assignment (
    customer_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    assigned_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_contacts(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES customer_segments(segment_id)
);
